title: Wikiwand - Detoxification (alternative medicine)
description: Detoxification is a type of alternative-medicine treatment which aims to rid the body of unspecified "toxins" - substances that proponents claim accumulate in the body over time and have undesirable short-term or long-term effects on individual health. Activities commonly associated with detoxification include dieting, fasting, consuming exclusively or avoiding specific foods , colon cleansing, chelation therapy, certain kinds of IV therapy and the removal of dental fillings containing amalgam.
